content.detailedDescription: I was walking home when i seen this object over my head about 300 to 500 feet above circle with a beam in the middle and a light in the center of the beam.Flipping around and light blinking in the middle.Stoped as if it new i was looking at it.Stayed over my head and others also seen this ufo a man on a bicycle at traffic light.I watched for over 10 min, before moving up and away seen another black spear going west at 500 feet above this white silver round tube with a tube stucture going across the middle with a blinking light dead center no sound.Planes flying not to far off.Air port stuttgart 20 min away.This has been the 4th or 5th i,ve seen since 2011 i,ve seen in germany.I see them all my life and i think i was abducted in the 70s in usa fla.As a child going to school in orlando fl.Year 1971.Am a ufo hunter!!!.Thank you!Mufon and people keep looking up our bro n sis are watching us always..................Peace to all!.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Hovering over my head flipping around with a light in the middle.

content.detailedDescription:
I thought you might like to hear of what i had seen on tuesday
at about 2.30pm on tuesday 30th august 2016 we had parked up in high hill farm corbetts tey upminster. we was waiting to get another job for our office. i had gotten out of the passenger side of our work van and was leaning against the door of the van having a cigarette. i was looking up into the sky at two contrails left by aeroplanes .They was in a v sort of shape that had the bottom end cut off if you get my drift. that's when i noticed ,it a metallic ball shaped object just sitting there in the sky dead center in the middle of these 2 contrails. the day was sunny and the sky was clear blue only a few clouds in the sky.As we are surrounded  by airports here so there was planes in the sky and you could make out the shapes of these planes quite clearly even those that i would say we're long hull flights and was quite high in the sky but this was definitely a ball shaped object.
it was motionless at the same height as the highest planes and it did not move at all in the ten or so minutes  that i was observing it. my colleague seemed to think that is was a drone or a ballon but it was motionless it didn't move at all in the ten minutes or so we observed it so it wasn't a ballon and i would not think a drone would be able to reach those heights ( i read planes travel at 45000 ft and this object seemed to be on par with that at least )
the object then moved slowly to my right, it's left .
if i can explain using a clock face i would say when i first observed the object it was at 12 o clock in the sky it then moved to 2 o'clock where it again remained stationery but it seemed a little higher in the sky then before as it was harder to see it. this movement took a couple of minutes and we again kept watching it although  now it was becoming hidden by a few clouds so it was harder to see. it was only that we knew it had moved that we could see  it was still there. we then stopped observing it and loaded up jobs for the rest of the day .
when we had finished and was about to leave the farm i looked into the sky again and the object had moved back to where it was when i had first observed it  although it seemed much higher in the sky then before
i know it wasn't a plane as planes could be clearly  seen in the sky at the  time . on first observation this was clearly a metallic ball shaped object . in the first 10 mins or so it did not move at all it just sat motionless in the sky so it could not have been a ballon or helicopter as it was to high up also i belive a drone could not fly that high. after i had seen the object back in its original position for at least a couple of minutes we left the farm and i did not observe it any more as we went to do jobs
content.summary: Metallic ball shaped object hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription: i was driving to work at approximately 9:45pm talking to my sister in law on the cell phone. the timing and brightness caught my attention. spotted one bright light moving north toward donaldsville. one light then split into two objects and continued in a northerly direction. at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter. after the split, i was then unsure. i was then curious. after 30-45 seconds, it moved out of sight.
content.summary: Spotted one bright moving north toward donaldsville. one light then split into two objects and continued a northerly direction.

content.detailedDescription: Well siting in my hot tub i always watch for satellites, i noticed 1 bright white object that was darting around in multiple directions then would stop and hover, i then saw 3 more in different parts of the sky.  the first object was over the norther bay of green bay, one to the south of me, and two to the north.  i grabbed my binoculars and could see bright white orbs with multicolored pulsing lights. they would move abruptly in any direction they wanted to, then stop and hover again. these objects remained in the sky for several hours.  they had absolutely no sound. i estimate their elevation at 15 to 20 thousand feet.
content.summary: Sighted between 1:45 – 4:00 am - 4 objects hovered stationary and darted around at approximately 15 to 20 thousand feet over the northern bay area

content.detailedDescription: Was camping at whiskers point campground @ mcleod lake bc with my daughter and my parents. wife was at home as she had to work the next day and wasn't out with us that night. we were sitting around the campfire. i was facing west, my daughter south and my parents north. i suddenly saw a super bright white light/orb (like a new cars bright halogen headlight) shoot straight up from behind the mountain across the lake. the size was comparable to a halogen head light from about 1/2 km away. it was approximately 1.5 miles away. it did not raise above the mountain, it was in a valley between 2 high points of the mountain. it sat there for about 2/3 secs then shot straight back down again. i yelled "did you guys just see that?!" neither my parents nor my daughter saw it. i explained to them what i had just seen and joked about how they probably think i'm crazy. then approximately 3 mins later my dad says loudly, "jer did you see that?!" i asked what he saw and he said it was about 500 meters north of where i saw my light but his was orange and it did exactly what mine did. i asked him if he was just saying that to make me feel better. he said "absolutely not, i just saw the same thing you did but it was orange." we both agreed it was not a meteor, star, plane, helicopter or anything we'd recognize as being anything we could explain. then the next night at approximately 2300hrs we were again sitting around the fire with the same people plus my wife this time, when my mom said "did you guys just see that?" nobody did. she claimed that a bright white light which was directly above the lake but south of us flashed brilliantly and then that was it. i asked her if it moved in any direction or had a tail or what its actions were. she said it was just a bright ball shape that flashed once and was gone. it was not ball lightning or anything we/i could explain.
content.summary: I saw a bright white light shoot up from behind a mountain across a lake. it hovered for 3 secs then shot straight back down. my father saw the exact same thing 3 mins later but the light was orange and 500 meters farther north.

content.detailedDescription: 11:57 pm- took my dog out to do his business in our front yard. he went to the edge of our property, a rock wall about four feet above the road, he stopped, completely still like he was frozen, and was looking up at the sky facing south. this caught my attention and i looked at the same area. within one to two seconds a glowing, silent object appeared, it looked to be 500 feet or less above ground, moving quickly from south to north. it was in view for approximately 5-10 seconds and couldn’t be seen after going behind trees. it was kind of egg/ walnut shaped, yellow-whitish glow, moving about 200 mph, completely silent. i know most, if not all, man made aircraft, this is not something common, nor known to be in use by any military. the shape was close to the craft in the movie, “flight of the navigator.” it absolutely was not a meteor or anything from nature.
content.summary: Egg/walnut shaped, glowing craft, holden, ma

content.detailedDescription:
Visiting a friends new home in northumberland, sitting in the conservatory when she asked “is that a drone?” i stood up and saw the aerial object, opening the door i stepped outside to see an orb-esque craft, 150 yards away, it was hard to determine the shape as it very slowly passed and i could see that the edges were almost hidden and the material wasn’t reflecting light in the way i am used to seeing objects, due to this the colour was also difficult to make out, a purple, greyish colour, maybe half the size of a small european car. i watched for a number of minutes, as it passed i ran down the side of the house and continued to watch it pass over the front and off into the distance eventually into the clouds. i simply stood and continually thought “wow, wow, wow.” it made no sound and did not turn, spin or make any physical movement except continue on what appeared to be a determent flight path.

as a side note i got my phone out to take a picture but couldn’t take my eyes off the craft, when i did put my code into the phone i felt that i didn’t want to mess on with the phone and miss the moment i was in, i felt that i should just watch intently. i did take a picture at the end when it was near to being completely out of sight in the clouds but looking at the image there is nothing. this took place within a couple of miles from newcastle airport.
content.summary: orb-esque craft, 150 yards away, it was hard to determine the shape as it very slowly passed

content.detailedDescription:
On september.02,2016 friday at 2355 hrs. on foot patrol in parking lot at parking lot. looking toward mississippi river over rock island illinois. i seen rectangular green object flying around,changing direction sudden and heights. object was flying real smooth and without any effort and no noise at all !. i freak out ! i lost sight as it zoom over the building.


july.04,2016 monday at 2100 hrs. coming out of my rear house to go to work, i've seen rectangular but in red color just hovering then move around the tree and lost sight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Rectangular green object flying around.

content.detailedDescription: We were at a friends house 4 dinner, left for a cabin we rented at up the creek near turkey run state park. i 1st noticed these while watching the lightening storm..(thought it was weird thet these "stars" were out during storm) we were not even a mile away from our friends house at this point. we turned left on sr. 59 heading towards the cabin and pulled over so i could take pics.. but both our phones were dead.. we got to the cabin.. they were still in the sky..& looked like the were moving oddly twitching and shaking or (idk convulsing?) i tried to get video again.. and phones were still not charged enough. then around 5 or 6 am we went 2 the restrooms and the objects were moving across the sky.. 1 headed north.. i turned 2 see the other 2 objects.. moving slowly.. 1 east far above us.. the other southeast and looked closer to the ground.. i looked to see the 1 heading north.. it was gone. the 1 heading est was now barely visable.. and the 3rd object heading southeast is the 1 we were finally able to capture on video. it stayed until sunrise. the entire night.. i was looking up and wondering wth? the entire night our phones would either not charge enough to capture any video or would not respond then return to the home screen. the lightening storm took up most of the evening, but i dont remember it raining.. i told ny fiance that it must be heat lightening? at 1st..He kept reassuring me (and maybe himself) that what we were seeing were drones.. but why would anyone jeopardize an expensive "toy" in a lightening storm?
content.summary: 1st saw during lightening storm around 9pm looked like stars. there were 3 in a triangle shape & didnt move until around 6am then took off n different directions at different speeds

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
My fiance & i were camping at white pines forest state park in the cedar ridge campgrounds, at site 6.  we had gone camping 2 weekends prior & i was eaten alive by mosquitoes resulting in over 400 bites.  this time we came prepared.  we circled our campsite with 4 tiki torches, 6 citronella bucket candles, tiki oil candles, the works.  once we built up the fire after coffee & dinner around 9:30pm saturday night, our site looked almost tribal with a bright ring of little fires around us & the big fire in the middle.

at 11:25pm, while sitting in a chair, my fiance took a series of photos on his phone of me moving the logs around in the fire.  i love campfires & was happy to toss around the logs & make sparks while he got his shot.  he accidentally took a few bursts of photos in the process, resulting in 86 photos over the course of a few minutes.  we looked through them together once he was finished, & i immediately made him trash a number of them.  

shortly after midnight, now early sunday morning, we moved over to a blanket in the grass in front of the bushes between us & site #5 to look at the stars & stretch out.  i commented on how wide awake i was, & that i could stay up to watch the sun rise.  my fiance agreed that he could as well. we're both night owls so this wouldn't be unusual for us.  it was a beautiful night. the rest of the campground had gone to bed, the air was still, the stars were out, & the crescent moon was beginning to peek up over the horizon through the trees in the north.  there was thunder & lightning off in the distance, but the sky was so clear from our vantage point, so the threat of rain didn't seem possible.   

while sitting on the blanket, we realized we were hearing what we assumed to be acorns dropping from the tree into the bushes directly in front of us, & a number of times it sounded like there could have been an animal rustling around in there. this went on for what we now look back on to be over an hour & a half while we hung out on the blanket.  

over the course of that time i began to get nervous & my jaw began to tense. after years of camping multiple time every summer, i'm not jumpy about animals, but the noises in the bushes continued for so long that it really started to put me on edge. my fiance was getting nervous too, both of us shining our flashlight into the bushes at every other noise that sounded suspicious.     

i moved candles to the edge of the bushes we're sitting 10 feet in front of, & added a couple citronella incense sticks for good measure, hoping to keep any animals away. after a little while, i went into the tent for pepper spray, which i then carried around with me looped to my wrist whenever i got up from the blanket.  at some point, my fiance points out the fire has stopped burning, so i added more wood. still feeling incredibly anxious, i walked around selecting the biggest pieces of gravel i could find from around the campfire, resulting in 2 large fistfuls of stones, which i piled on the blanket in front of us in case we needed to throw rocks at a coyote or something. by this point, my jaw is completely tight & i have been clenching my teeth.  i have never in my life armed myself with weapons when i am camping.      

the last time i asked him to check his watch, he played the same game he always does, making me guess. i'm usually off by only 5-15 minutes. we had done this a few times earlier that day & after being close again the 3rd time, i commented on how i was like father time.  this time i guessed it to be 1:15am & was surprised that it was already 3:00am. 

i make a comment about how nice it was that the noises in the bushes had finally stopped because it had really been making me anxious. the campground was incredibly quiet, & inside our fire cirle, i felt like we were completely alone, & told my fiance.  shortly after, he points out a bright star in the sky between two other stars above the horizon in the southwest, & asks me if the center star is moving.  the center "star" kept wiggling around, and bouncing.  the 3 "stars" appeared as a straight line parallel to the horizon, & when steady, the 3 points of light appeared to be equally spaced apart.  

we quickly decided it wasn't an airplane. none of the lights were flashing, & the dancing middle "star" made it appear as if the object were heading straight towards us at a fast pace. i guessed it was maybe a comet passing by earth.  we got up from the blanket & walked a little closer to the road for a while to watch the strange lights. after probably a half hour of him standing there watching the formation move closer to the horizon, the "stars" began to disappear from view behind the trees.   

we walked northwest down the street to the next campsite to see if there we could get a better view through the trees somewhere else.  while we walked, i could see more stars above the tree lines to the northwest.  giving my eyes a double-check, i looked at the brightest star, noticed a dimmer star on either side of it, & realized the center star was wiggling all over the place exactly like the other formation was. this second formation was also dropping closer to the horizon.  we started asking ourselves if we were seeing ufos. neither of us had experienced anything like this before.  

we went back to the blanket for our flashlights so we could walk to the darker area of the campground & get a better view of the formation. following the direction the "stars" were located, we found ourselves at the gated off road leading to the spring creek youth group campground. 

we decided to continue back around the loop & check back with the first formation.  as we walked toward site 22, we saw a large (8'-0" in diameter) flashing bright blue orb of light. the orb stayed in roughly the same spot, but the brightest spot within the orb constantly jumping locations with each flash, every second. we walked closer & i jokingly asked if we were seeing aliens right now.  up until now, we had been walking in the dark & he turned his flashlight on, & maybe 20 feet in front of us was a car with a dimly flashing blue light alerting that the car had an alarm.  he turned the flashlight off & we watched the interior of the car gently light up with the dim blue light softly illuminating the dashboard & windows. it was not the same big circular burst of light we were seeing before, but we quickly dismissed it because we were more focused on the lights in the sky.   

a while after seeing these first two strange trio of lights, the sky began to slowly fill with triangular formations of "stars."  upon focusing on the triangular formations, their disguise would disappear.  the 3 "stars" hovered slowly in unison (like a bird floating in the air making mild adjustments to stay balanced), which allowed us to focus on the gently backlit shape of the black triangle ship the "stars" were camouflaging. we counted up to maybe 6 triangles moving high in the sky, & we were mesmerized.

more & more triangle ships appeared in the sky, some big, some small.  we stood on the street in front of site 15, & i pointed each formation out & counted up to 18, & then i stopped.  looking around at every bright "star" i found in the sky, i could then locate the 2 dimmer "stars" creating the equilateral & isosceles triangle shapes. the sky was full & everything was moving.  

at this point, we turned our attention back to our bright campsite.  backlit by the crescent moon, three large triangle ships hovered in the air arced around our campsite, as if curious about the giant circle of fire set up in our site.  one of the three ships was directly over the tree & bushes in front of the blanket in the grass we had been sitting on earlier.  it wasn't much higher than the top of the tree.  the biggest of the 3 hovered in the sky maybe 200-300 feet above site #5.

the rest of the ships seemed to radiate in a giant arc around those ships covering our entire campground's skies. most of the ships appeared to hover in their position.  high in the sky, some triangles were corner to corner with each other. a few others had red or blue lights on them, but all the other ships were camouflaged as white stars, always with the center star as the brightest of the 3.

over the course of the evening, we watched probably a dozen comets leave long streaks across the sky.  we noticed single "stars" moving slowly across the length of the sky above us, & then stop at a triangle of "stars" high up in the sky.  this happened maybe 3 or 4 times.  what we first thought was a white comet flew through the sky leaving a long tail & then zigzagged up & down real fast like an ekg wave for a few seconds leaving an impression of the wiggle in the sky for a few more seconds.  

the ships lower to the ground were at the height of the tops of the trees and the bottoms of their triangles had more "stars" that appeared as a square.  while focusing on those squares, i realized the size of the "star" formations on the bottom of the ships were getting bigger and bigger, which drew my attention to the overall larger shape of the triangle and the fact that the ship was dropping in elevation & heading straight towards us.  the ship was as high as the top of the trees & descending, & this happened to us 3 different times before the sun rose.

we ran to hide by the bathrooms but a man came out of the building & we were now nervous to talk to anyone.  he walked to the edge of the sidewalk & stood on the curb & looked out toward the northwest.  we tried to hide behind the men's bathrooms, but it was so dark back there that it made me more nervous. when we walked back to the front of the building, the man had left, so we looked for shadows & ran to the dark entrance of the women's bathroom so we could hide & have our backs to the wall.  we stood there maybe 20 seconds & the light turns on. i checked later during the day & this light is on at all hours. 

in the beginning, all of the triangles were equilaterals.  as the sky began to fill, we saw isosceles triangle ships, and one ship had a triangular body & a long extension off the center point, like a guitar neck.   at one point, i looked to see all the stars in the sky moving. i pointed it out to my fiance, both of us focusing on the edge of the trees, to see all of the stars slowly sliding out of view behind the trees.  an enormous ship was passing over us, while all the triangles of ships beneath it were still visible at all different elevations.

we are in full survival mode & hiding in the shadows & whenever we felt safe enough, we headed back to the road between site #15 & #18 because it had the best tree cover & shadow for us to hide in, with the best view of the sky & our campsite, which i kept watching to see if anything was walking around in. a man woke up around 5:00, went into his car by site 15 & we saw him again a very short time later. we may have woken him up with our panicked whispering outside his campsite.   

it's getting later & later, & my fiance now is talking about how we should just go to bed, & how if they had wanted us, they could have taken us by now. i refused to go back to the campsite until the sun rose, & couldn't understand how he could want to go back. closer to sunrise, i had him put my glasses on instead of his, & he was able to make out more shapes deeper in the sky, so he was not getting the full experience i was with clearer vision.  as the sky finally started to get bright, the number of triangles diminished until the sky was empty.  

there was no way i was going to be able to sleep, & at this point my jaw is so tight & in pain, i have developed a mild tick, & i am taking short panicked breaths only through my mouth.  to calm down, i suggest a walk.

we went down the gated off road to spring creek youth group campground that we found ourselves on when we were checking out the 2nd formation & decided to see what was down there. the ground in both this campground & fox canyon youth group campground appear to have large symmetrical faint impressions in the dewy grass.  the outer shape looked symmetrical, while the shapes within did not.  there were some larger circles with smaller swirled circles contained within.  the impressions are soft in the grass, but the dew helped make them stand out.  unsure, i stood on picnic tables, & kept changing my height & perspective, & i was beginning to feel crazy because of the last few hours we had just had. my fiance was exhausted & cranky, & wasn't seeing what i was seeing, & it was making me begin to feel silly for looking for crop circles like a fanatic.  so i didn't ask to borrow his phone to take pictures.  nor did we ever even think to capture an image when we were seeing everything in the sky.  which just blows my mind.  

we slept for 2 hours & then packed up to drive home.  on the drive, we found a mufon post from 6/11/16, a month and a half ago, from someone reporting a light orb at white pines forest state park, at the cedar ridge campground, at our exact same site...  

when we were home looking at the photos of me in front of the fire from late saturday night, i started looking for anything in the dark shadows of the trees behind me.  flipping through the shots like a movie, we started following this red glow that seemed to move differently from the fire or smoke.  it appeared to follow me.  upon closer examination, the head, eyes, outline of the chest & arm appear faintly behind the smoke in one shot, appearing & disappearing in the surrounding photos. i had my fiance recover all the photos from this series that i had trashed, & we separated all the burts so we could see everything that happened.  following that red ight again starting with the first shot, my fiance realized the 2 red circles with the green between them was actually a face & eyes standing directly in front of him while he was taking the photos.  in the photos, i turn from the fire & talk to my fiance & the red eye shapes turn toward my direction & disappear leaving a symmetrical green shape (the back of the head). the shape then appears to follow me around the fire as if it's studying me (that is the point when it is most visible), then it walks back up to my fiance, face to face, & behind it's head, a finger points at the sky for a few shots.

we saw the first ufo around 3am sunday morning, but the photos were taken at 11:25pm saturday night, which meant we weren't alone that whole time. and all the noises we heard in the bushes... they probably weren't just acorns.  we thought the whole thing lasted 3-1/2 hours until we found the pictures & realized it was actually a 7 hour experience.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 50+ trianglular ufos hovered over our campground, witnessed large blue orb, & photos at 11:25 revealed an invisible being in the campfire smoke observing us.

content.detailedDescription:
This is an example of a "sneak in" ufo sighting where none of the activity was noticed until viewing this video five years later!

we were in the first fifteen or twenty minutes of driving into joshua tree national park before we approached a medium sized rock formation and got the urge to pull over.

i started filming the landscape and panned to the right, and stopped. right before i start to pan back to the left, if you look at the ground in front of the left leaning joshua tree in the foreground, you'll see a puff of dust come from the ground before a triangular object shoots upwards and to the right.

the shape then changes from a triangle to a blip or thick line.

a mini triangle shaped object seems to project suddenly off the the right and upwards, rotating clockwise, with the corners of the object lighting up. by the time it gets to the trees it changes form and looks more like a blip or small cylinder.

i searched extensively for birds that can take off "that fast" from a standstill and was unable to find anything at all.

even peregrine falcons, birds that can fly up to 240 miles per hour, only get that fast from a dive starting well above the ground. when watching it or any bird take off, you can see wings pushing against air and gravity to begin the flight...And its "slow"...Extremely slow, in comparison to the speed at which this object is taking off. 

no animal, insect or bird or otherwise, takes off from the ground this fast.
content.summary: Mini-ufo takeoff in joshua tree national park

content.detailedDescription:
While filming the first part of the thunderbirds air demonstration in september of 2015, an object streaked from behind the clouds and through the top of the frame, making a noise as it did so.

the object was not noticed until the next day when viewing the video.

after getting a closer look, we saw that the object originated behind the cloud, then hops over cloud banks twice, then streaks upward and to the left above the aircraft into another cloud and beyond.

the shape went from a metallic looking egg shape in the clouds while "hopping", and then changed to what looks like a spherical object with some kind of triangular apparatus on the rear end while streaking through the air, then disappearing.

at the end of the clip you can see a point of light very quickly move from the tail of the c-5 towards the oncoming plane formation.
content.summary: Ufo streaks above thunderbirds demonstration at jb andrews

content.detailedDescription:
While filming the first part of the thunderbirds air demonstration in september of 2015, an object streaked from behind the clouds and through the top of the frame, making a noise as it did so.

at the end of the clip you can see a point of light very quickly move from the tail of the c-5 towards the oncoming plane formation.
content.summary: Ufo streaks above thunderbirds demonstration at jb andrews

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my couch doing something on the computer.  i looked up and i saw a pulsing light in the west. i thought that it must be a star or plane. 
hard to say how far away it was but i would guess that it was pretty close to bodega bay. i jump up and got my binoculars. when i focused in on it, i saw what reminded me of a star burst firework but much more dense and compact. at first it seemed white but then it became a white glowing with little colored spots. it started moving.  it may have slowly moved horizontally first but i'm not sure.Then it very slowly sank straight down until it went behind the hills. 
this is my third ufo sighting. while i was watching it, i was having a incredibly hard time believing what i was seeing. of course i was thrilled and extremely excited but in the back of my mind i was thinking that it was crazy to think that i was actually seeing a spaceship. it was too easy.
i ran to get my cell phone to take a picture but by the time i got back it was gone.
content.summary: Ball of white light approx. over bodga bay

content.detailedDescription: I was at nicolet college field star watching, when i noticed 50+ flashing lights come up over the tree line to the south.  they were randomly flashing some bright some dim.  they hovered for about 3 minutes before moving off to the east. as they moved east they seemed to consolidate into 6-7 bright lights.  i am not sure how to describe the noise as they moved off into the distance.  when they were near me there was no sound.  i was only able to get one video of the objects before my phone started to malfunction.  i was only able to get a small portion of the lights.  it is hard to see on video if you have the lights on.
content.summary: 50+ flashing lights in ski above nicolet college field

content.detailedDescription:
It was in hermosa, sd.  we were returning home late at night (me, my wife and 3 children ages 13, 11, and 5).  a car was parked alongside the road with a couple outside of it looking up.  we pulled over to see if they were having car problems.  it was then we noticed the craft, huge, diamond shaped moving accross the valley.  i had served for 2 years on an aircraft carrier in the navy, and this craft was much larger.  it moved totally silent over the valley very slowly.  various lights were on the craft.  we watched the craft move slowly for a few minutes.  upon reaching the end of the valley, the front of the craft started rising toward the stars and then, without a sound took off at an incredible speed and was gone in a couple of seconds.

the object scared my children, but my wife and i were just staring dumbfounded. i wish cell phones with cameras had been invented back then so i could have recorded it.  when we got home we all sat down in separate places in the house and drew pictures of what we each saw.  every drawing was nearly identical.  unfortunately 3 months later the church i was pastoring closed, and we ended up becoming homeless and were forced to leave everything we owned with friends in rapid city.  we never could get back to pick up our stuff which included those drawings.

this wasn't the first experience we had with ufos and lights in that area.  also since my childhood, i have experienced other strange events that may or may not be connected to abductions.  i've never openly shared any of this with anyone, except my wife and a very few close friends.  as a pastor at the time, most christians weren't exactly open to the idea of aliens and especially alien abduction.  many of these events in my life from childhood to about the age to 42 remain a mystery to me.  i'm not saying that i experienced abduction but i might have, several times.
content.summary: Perhaps the size of 2 football field, looked like 2 star destroyers back-to-back

content.detailedDescription:
22:45  09-02-16
in front of my house having a vape. i'm always looking up between the trees on either side of my driveway...Always looking for shooting stars. prior to vaping i noticed a small object moving at a steady fast rate of speed...Looked like a piece of cloud...Ovalish in general shape..Completely fuzzy,puffy like a cloud..From where i was standing it appeared to be the size of my thumb,at the first knuckle...It moved in a straight line and i lost site of it due to the roofline (2 story home)....This is the 4th one i have seen over 4-5 years...Always appear to be a piece of cloud, always completely silent, always at the same constant rapid speed, only see it for less than 10 seconds,sometimes moving with the prevalent wind direction,sometimes moving against the prevalent wind direction...1st one i've seen in mansfield tx, saw 2 while living in burleson tx, and 1 while working in the rail yard off vickery street in ftw tx....All at night....I call them "ghosts clouds" because of their stereotypical ghostly/cloud appearance....1st time i've ever reported anything like this here,much less talk about it to anyone..Just feel lucky to see something out of the ordinary in the night skies as i'm usually at work sometime during the night..Thanks and have a nice evening.
btw, no clouds were above my house as there were earlier during the day
content.summary: Looked like a very small piece of cloud,ovals,fuzzy outline,rapid speed

content.detailedDescription: Humanoid reptilian looking squid man with black cloak over him almost like a protective device also saw a tiny gnome-like alien humanoid creatures with black cloaks over their bodies as looks very a black and humanoid in the face almost like tribals people of some sort indian two hispanic origin and very ape like in the face big noses and likes to jump canbe transpatent or invisable and disapear when they want to i saw them inside my mobile home they was standing over me and my daughter one night when we woke up we was very scared it pinched or hurt my kid and i try to syop it but when it saw that i saw it it got angry and looked at me and threw me into unconsciousness when i woke up i felt like my neck was broken.It was underneath the blankets crawlimg hiding and began to crawl in our bed when i woke up and saw him he looked at me and forcefully push me back with just looking at me it felt like i got hit by a car i woke up later on because i was knocked unconscious by the force when i woke up it literally felt like my neck was broken all i can have is flashback after flashback not knowing what this is or what i saw what type of humanoid being could have done this i keep having flashbacks of a reptilian humanoid being with a black cloak over him almost like a protective suit or device he was wearing it's almost like he was floating as well so scary to wake up and have something like that inside your also after that happened i began experiencing seeing them like alien humanoid small little people very tiny in size they can disappear and reappear when they want they also have black little clothes and cloaks that they wear over them over there bodies  i don't know if this is a protective device that they wear over their bodies or what and i do not know how they are getting in and out of our home we are moving soon for safety of lids and our animals .
content.summary: War dark black protective cloak around his body humanoid like big eyes don't forget the black cloak and hat and the big eyes was in my mobile home in my bedroom when i woke up standing over me and my daughter

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck smoking a cigarette and i saw a dull white light to the north fly really fast like the speed of a shooting star from west to east then saw one from the ground level shoot straight up then another one from east to west. thinking this is weird and definitely unusual as we see planes all the time and this isn't normal. i had my husband and son come out to watch and we witnessed for over 20 minutes these dull white lights go one direction to another some straight lines some diagonal up down. truely a unreal sight.  some would come from one direction stop mid air and change direction another one came from east and did a quick turn back east. we couldn't believe this was happening.  we also saw a plane (we know it was a plane because it had flash lights and was moving slow like the planes do) in the air at one point in the middle of this and one of these white lights circled it one direction then circle back the other direction the shoot straight up i can not tell you how many unidentifiable objects we saw but we know it had to be several. since this lasted so long i feel sure we can't be the only ones seeing this so i called and repored this to the local police whom called me back and were checking with the airport. i hope they will follow back up with me. what im certain of is they were not shooting stars they were not airplanes or drones. i'm so glad my husband and son witnessed this too. it was incredible to see. i'm in shock
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several dull white light different directs would stop and change direction circled airplane and changed direction

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was late at night, around 1:17 am est, when i went to look outside through our dining room window to see what the weather was like. just as soon as i looked up at the night sky, i simply saw a very bright perfectly circular orb powered up from inside one of the clouds - it was so bright and there were no lightning going on, for certain. i could tell that the source of the light was an extraterrestrial craft, unquestionably. the way the light emitted, i immediately knew it was not an act of mother nature. i was hoping to see more but it did not occur again; but better yet, while looking at that part of the sky where the "power up" took place - i kept going and looked further up to almost right above in the sky, i clearly saw a yellowish-white circular orb (no anti-collision lights or strobes from any airplanes, assuredly) moving erratically but was in a gliding fashion til it was out of sight from my vantage point. well, i am quite familiar with satellites, commercial and military drones, airplanes and such man-made objects moving around the night sky - but this was not it, to simply put it. the way the light maneuvered, it was as if it was designed to defy gravity and how it glided so gracefully like you would see how an air hockey puck would move. get the picture?

this was my first ever witnessed ufo craft. i won't be surprised that the darling extraterrestrials from these crafts "knew" that it was seen and how they wanted to be seen.
content.summary: Two events within few seconds apart. one white circular bright light flashed and other yellow-ish white light glided aimlessly against dark night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out on my front porch to look at the stars i live in rural area and you see them really well i looked over my house to the west and saw a large airplane and contrail scanning the sky to my left in a southern direction i saw a  very large craft very high when i first saw it i thought that two very large planes  flying nose to tail maybe refueling but there were six large red lights between the wings and sometimes they blinked but not fast like plane does. i stood there watching it disappear out of view telling myself it was a couple of planes but i don't think it was and when stepped in house and told my wife i just saw the strangest plane but i believe i saw a ufo
content.summary: I stepped outside to look at the stars i saw a airliner traveling west and to the south i saw the wildest looking plane i have ever seen double wings with six large red blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: While flying from sacramento to las vegas with a friend, she observed a bright silvery orb hovering in the sky. it was just before dusk. we flew past it and it seemed to be stationary. she took three pictures of the object which are included. you will see in the photos that it is clearly hovering above the ground. could have been in the area of nellis air force base or area51.
content.summary: Saw a stationary silvery orb while flying from sacramento to las vegas.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting out back yard.Looked foward and noticed brigth star like object.At first look thinking a star or venus about 11 degrees above horizon.But dismissed that then thinking a helocopter or airplane or some other type of aircraft.Still looking noticed it went from a brigth starlike obect to even brigther object but still starlike.The brigthness to incressing brigthness happen in i  think about 2 seconds.The object then went from star like to a  circular ball glowinging different colors.Stoped on a dime made a bizzare movement that i  never see before.Then it moved off to the west again at a very  fast speed.
content.summary: Star like very brigth sationarey.Incressed in brigtness in blink of an eye.Star like to gloweing ball in 2 seconds.Hovered then lft at fast speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Went to pick up my son from work on the way i saw what looked like a rocket or the fire left by one it was like a comet but there was no tail or no smoke
behind it like a long bright yellow flame. i stopped 3 times to see it because trees were in the way. every time i stopped i pointed to the sky and blew my horn hoping some other car would stop and see it. when i got to where my son was at, i pulled into the parking lot and noticed another one traveling west it was the same size  same shape same color it was exactly the same as the first object. i told my son to take a video of them but they were to far apart to get them both so he just took a picture of one. we watched until they went out of view.
content.summary: Fire in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving east on interstate 84 a few miles west of newburgh, ny at 2 pm september 2nd, 2016 i spotted 4 small round bright white objects slowly moving south across my vision at fairly low altitude.  i thought the objects might be birds but the formation seemed a little odd for birds and they were very bright white.  i thought, perhaps seagulls as they drifted out of my vision.  before i got to where they had gone over the highway 2 small jet planes (probably military) streaked across after them at low altitude and very high speed.  i could see the exhaust from one jet very clearly.  they were quite close behind the objects which were now out of view.  probably less than a minute later the jets streaked back in a north easterly direction, this time going up.  the actions of the jet planes made me reconsider the idea that the small white objects were seagulls.
content.summary: 4 bright white small objects floating across my view.  2 jets at low altitude chasing

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my bed, awake, reading something on my phone. all lights in the house and my bedroom were off. i saw a bright white softball shaped light to the left outside my bedroom window. about ten feet off the ground. i thought for a second that it was a person with a flashlight and was scared. but as it moved, it did not waver. it was moving in a straight line. someone with a flashlight would be bouncing it a bit. this did not bounce or waver at all. it moved past my bedroom window and i jumped out of bed. looked out a side window that faces my back yard. i watched the orb move across my back yard and disappear into the woods behind my house. it did not land. there was no sound. i felt restless and very anxious for about two hours afterwards before i could settle down to sleep.
content.summary: Bright white orb with halo around it

content.detailedDescription: I saw a dark odd shaped object hovering in the sky. i ran into my house to get my phone. when i returned the object was still there. i took some pictures then started video. the object started to move slowly to the southwest. in less than 2 minutes the object was out of view. low on the horizon and behind a house.
content.summary: I saw a dark object hovering in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My cousin took photos of the object. she was taking photos of the sun set and didn't notice the object until looking at it at a later date. photos were taken in ocean city md. on a balcony out side of a hotel. this was not through glass and there were no lights in the area.
content.summary: My cousin took the photos. she was taking the sunset. she did not see the object until the photos were looked at later.

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:20 in the afternoon , near the merced church in the center of the city, appeared this figure, which passed near to the window where i was . i faster went for my camera that i made the first video in which i told in amazement that i was watching, then went to the terrace and could better locate the camera and by monitoring the path of the object i can show details as height and distance. 
finally zoom the camera did not allow me to continue tracking the object .

eran aproximadamente las 5:20 de la tarde, en dirección a la iglesia de la merced centro de la ciudad, apareció esta figura, la cual pasó muy cerca de la ventana donde yo estaba. rápidamente fui por mi cámara con la cual realicé el primer video en el que narro con asombro lo que estaba observando, posteriormente, salí a la terraza donde ya pude ubicar mejor la cámara y gracias al seguimiento de la trayectoria del objeto puedo mostrar detalles como altura y distancia. 
finalmente el zoom de la cámara no me permitió continuar con el seguimiento del objeto.
content.summary: While in the kitchen of my house on the fourth floor , went fastest near the window , i went for my camera and recorded the event.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving and we noticed somethin with with irregular lights and flying pattern at about plane highth, then instantly at helicopter hight. we pulled over and instantly came right above us. i would be able to draw what the bottom looked like. i took out my phone to film it, but it wasn't working right so i closed it. next thing i know we're on the car driving in dead silence, but not awkward.To the house, and i guess went to bed. i could tell more about the next day, but i don't know if it that important.
content.summary: Something came to us and above us. tried to film it when right right over me, but closed my phone and last i remember, than got home, but like in a trance. i promise i'm not a crazy person. i just want to know what happened.
